name: Therais Book
description:
Therais Book is an open world one-man-project MMORPG with unique items and rare drops, monsters and animals, pets, instances, and everything you need to have a good time, alone or with your friends. Form groups and guilds and tackle big bosses together.

Features:

->Multiplayer
– Playing together gives more experience to everyone on your team!
– PVP

>Guilds
– More features to guilds coming soon

>Pets
– Small, big, cute, horrifying: there’s something for everybody
– Pets fight by your side, level up, and get stronger.

>Open World
– Follow the Story or “make” your own, it’s an adventure either way.

>Rare and unique items
– Drop chances as low as 0.001% and Items that can only drop once. Try your luck!´

>Bosses
– BIG EPIC BOSS FIGHTS 😀

Please be aware that this game is a one-man-project developed in my free time.
